meanings.sent1: Exercising regularly can help strengthen your muscles.
meanings.sent2: Eating healthy foods can strengthen your body.
meanings.sent3: I tried to strengthen my math skills by counting my candy.
meanings.sent4: Her encouraging words helped strengthen my resolve.
meanings.sent5: The storm's howling winds seemed to strengthen the old house.

meanings.definition: To increase the power, effectiveness, or resilience of something.
meanings.sent1: Adding more batteries can strengthen the flashlight's brightness.
meanings.sent2: Studying hard can strengthen your knowledge.
meanings.sent3: The chef used extra spices to strengthen the flavor of the soup.
meanings.sent4: Her smile seemed to strengthen the team's morale.
meanings.sent5: The sun's rays seemed to strengthen the flowers in the garden.

meanings.sent1: Wearing a helmet can strengthen your head's protection.
meanings.sent2: Building a fence can strengthen the security of your home.
meanings.sent3: I used extra glue to strengthen the bond between the pieces.
meanings.sent4: Her advice acted like a shield to strengthen my decision.
meanings.sent5: The knight's armor seemed to strengthen his defense in battle.
